T02D2169:313b-1: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D2169:313b-3: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2169:313b-4: bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2169:313b-5: nyon mongs gdung ba sel mdzad pa'i //
T02D2169:313b-6: zla ba lta bu'i mthu mnga' ba'i //
T02D2169:313b-7: thams cad sel zhing snang bar byed //
T02D2169:313b-8: mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2169:313b-9: las mtha'i rtsod pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2169:313b-10: las ngan rtsod pa zhes byed pa //
T02D2169:313b-11: nyi ma lta bu'i 'od zer ni //
T02D2169:313b-12: bdag gis phan phyir bshad par bya //
T02D2169:313b-13: las kyi dbang gis mi mthun pa'i //
T02D2169:313b-14: nad la sogs pa sna tshogs 'byung //
T02D2169:314a-0: de nyid 'joms byed mthu yi mchog / gsang sngags 'khor lo @314a * //
T02D2169:314a-2: dang por snod rnams bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:314a-3: slob dpon sgrub po gnyis su dbye //
T02D2169:314a-4: shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang //
T02D2169:314a-5: dam tshig sngom pa gnas pa dang //
T02D2169:314a-6: snod rnams dbye ba'i rim shes dang //
T02D2169:314a-7: 'gro don phan sems brtson pa dang //
T02D2169:314a-8: dbang rnams rdzogs shing man ngag thob //
T02D2169:314a-9: rgyud don gzhan rnams shes pa dang //
T02D2169:314a-10: pha rol phyin pa'i don la mkhas //
T02D2169:314a-11: bden pa rnam gnyis gtan la 'bebs //
T02D2169:314a-12: nyon mongs chung zhing sems rnams thul //
T02D2169:314a-13: lus ngag yid gsum spyod lam mkhas //
T02D2169:314a-14: dus dang gnas skabs dbye ba shes //
T02D2169:314a-15: bya dang mi bya'i rim pa dang //
T02D2169:314a-16: gnang dang dgag pa'i rim brtson rnams //
T02D2169:314a-17: shes pa de ni slob dpon nyid //
T02D2169:314a-18: dang ldan bla ma la ni gus //
T02D2169:314a-19: g-yo sgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02D2169:314a-20: rdzas dang lus srog 'bul byed dang //
T02D2169:314a-21: yang nas yang du gsol 'debs pa //
T02D2169:314a-22: spyod lam la sogs mdzes pa yis ;
T02D2169:314a-23: / dus rim du ni 'khor byed pa //
T02D2169:314a-24: mandal me tog bcas pa yin //
T02D2169:314a-25: gus pas zhabs la phyag byed pa //
T02D2169:314a-26: slob mar zhugs kyi shes par bya //
T02D2169:314a-27: phyag rgya mchog ni don du gnyer //
T02D2169:314a-28: mi rnams kun gyis dben pa yi //
T02D2169:314a-29: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2169:314a-30: yo byad rdzas rnams 'tshogs pa yis //
T02D2169:314a-31: dag ba la sogs sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2169:314a-32: yid gnyis med pa'i brtson 'grus ldan //
T02D2169:314a-33: gus pas man ngag bdud rtsi 'di //
T02D2169:314a-34: glegs bam la ni brten pa brtsams //
T02D2169:314a-35: nges pa'i man ngag bdud rtsi 'di //
T02D2169:314a-36: rna brgyud 'ongs te thugs la gnas //
T02D2169:314a-37: zhal gyi sgo ru bton nas kyang ;
T02D2169:314a-38: / de bzhin sgrub pos blang bar bya //
T02D2169:314a-39: thabs kyi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis //
T02D2169:314a-40: dang po dus su rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2169:314a-41: rim bzhin lnga yi bar du blang //
T02D2169:314a-42: de ltar blangs pa'i don shes na //
T02D2169:314a-44: rgyud sogs gzhan nas 'byung ba yi //
T02D2169:314a-45: de lta bu yi don shes pas //
T02D2169:314a-46: sgrub po zhes ni btags pa yin //
T02D2169:314a-47: sgrub pa po ni de dag kyang //
T02D2169:314a-48: shes rab snying rje che brtson ni //
T02D2169:314a-49: dang po bla ma bsten gyur nas //
T02D2169:314a-51: yang na de tsam mi ldan yang //
T02D2169:314a-52: yul dang dus kyis bskal gyur na //
T02D2169:314b-0: cha rkyen rdzogs par tshang @314b dgos pas //
T02D2169:314b-1: bla ma la ni gus pa yis //
T02D2169:314b-2: skyob byed mthu rnams mi 'dra bas //
T02D2169:314b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab mthu ldan pa //
T02D2169:314b-4: nges par shin tu rdzogs par bya //
T02D2169:314b-5: de rnams dgos pa'i bstan pa ni //
T02D2169:314b-6: dper na dpa' bo g-yul du zhugs na //
T02D2169:314b-7: go rnams rdzogs par ma gyur pas //
T02D2169:314b-8: mtshon gyis phog ste slar log ltar //
T02D2169:314b-9: de bzhin bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen yang //
T02D2169:314b-10: ma tshang slar la ldog nyan yod //
T02D2169:314b-11: yang na mthu rnams bsam mi khyab //
T02D2169:314b-12: sman gyi mthu rnams ji bzhin te //
T02D2169:314b-13: gang la gang 'phrod las dang rkyen //
T02D2169:314b-14: mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya //
T02D2169:314b-15: de yi don rnams shes bya ba //
T02D2169:314b-16: bde gshegs sras po mkhas pas su //
T02D2169:314b-17: rgyud du bya ba brgyad ces bya //
T02D2169:314b-18: dngos grub rnam gnyis thob byed pa'i //
T02D2169:314b-19: bskyed rdzogs shes pa'i gtso bo yis //
T02D2169:314b-20: de yi yan lag 'khor bshad pa //
T02D2169:314b-21: tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg gtor chen po //
T02D2169:314b-23: / de rnams las rnams thams cad rdzogs //
T02D2169:314b-24: dam tshig nyams pa cher byung na //
T02D2169:314b-25: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol phyir //
T02D2169:314b-26: dkyil 'khor cho ga shes par bya //
T02D2169:314b-27: de ma nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2169:314b-28: mandal me tog bcas pa la //
T02D2169:314b-29: brten nas sdig bshags cho ga bya'o ;
T02D2169:314b-30: / dam tshig nyams pa chen po dang //
T02D2169:314b-31: dang po dbang yang thob pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:314b-32: dbang mchog cho ga shes par bya //
T02D2169:314b-33: bar chod myur du byung ba na //
T02D2169:314b-34: stang stabs bgegs bskrad shes par bya //
T02D2169:314b-36: 'chi bslu'i cho ga shes par bya //
T02D2169:314b-37: yid ches brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:314b-38: mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan shes par bya //
T02D2169:314b-39: de kun rtsa ba'i dam tshig yin //
T02D2169:314b-40: bzlas brjod byas pas don rnams 'grub //
T02D2169:314b-41: bdud rtsi la sogs rdzas rnams ni //
T02D2169:314b-42: sgrub thabs sbyor thabs mkhas pas su //
T02D2169:314b-43: lus sogs las su rung bar bya //
T02D2169:314b-44: de ltar cha rkyen tshang ba yis ;
T02D2169:314b-45: / phyag rgya'i mchog ni don du gnyer //
T02D2169:314b-46: dngos grub phran tshogs zhar las 'byung //
T02D2169:314b-47: de ltar gdeng ldan rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2169:314b-48: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2169:314b-49: tshes grangs bzang po shis pa la //
T02D2169:314b-50: chos skyong srung ma la sogs la //
T02D2169:314b-51: bsgo zhing bgegs rnams zhi bar byed //
T02D2169:315a-2: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan snga ru //
T02D2169:315a-3: dam bca' byas te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2169:315a-4: yi ge brgya sogs cho ga yis //
T02D2169:315a-5: nyes pa kun ni sbyangs nas kyang //
T02D2169:315a-6: sa gzhi legs pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2169:315a-7: mandal me tog legs par bkram //
T02D2169:315a-8: phyi nang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kun //
T02D2169:315a-9: bsags te ma lus rgyan rnams gram //
T02D2169:315a-10: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa'i //
T02D2169:315a-11: bde bar gshegs pa'i glegs bam de //
T02D2169:315a-12: rin chen na bza' mdzes byas la //
T02D2169:315a-14: gsung gi rtags su gzhag par bya //
T02D2169:315a-15: 'bur ram lugs sam ris su bris //
T02D2169:315a-16: shin tu mdzes pa'i sku mchog de //
T02D2169:315a-17: sku yi rtags su gzhag par bya //
T02D2169:315a-18: rdo rje dril sogs phyag mtshan rnam //
T02D2169:315a-19: lugs dang mthun pa'i mdzes pa de //
T02D2169:315a-20: thugs kyi rtags su gzhag par bya //
T02D2169:315a-21: de dag kun la don dam du //
T02D2169:315a-22: rab tu gnas pa med mod kyang //
T02D2169:315a-23: yang dag kun rdzob nyid du ni //
T02D2169:315a-24: rgyal ba lhums zhugs ji gzhin no //
T02D2169:315a-25: de ltar byin rlabs mthu chen pa //
T02D2169:315a-26: ci byas thams cad rdzogs chen 'gyur //
T02D2169:315a-27: de bas brtson 'grus bskyed de bya //
T02D2169:315a-28: gal te rnal 'byor dbul gyur na //
T02D2169:315a-29: thams cad mos pa'i spyod yul na //
T02D2169:315a-30: dbul bar ma gyur ser sna yis //
T02D2169:315a-31: sogs par de ni mi byed par //
T02D2169:315a-32: chos dang mi mthuj spyod pa yin //
T02D2169:315a-33: de bas gus pas brtson 'grus bya //
T02D2169:315a-34: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam kyis ni //
T02D2169:315a-35: bskyed dang rdzogs la brten bya ste /
T02D2169:315a-36: dang po bskyed pa'i tshul nam ni //
T02D2169:315a-37: skad cig sprul dang cho ga lnga //
T02D2169:315a-38: gsum gyi tshul du bstan pa dang //
T02D2169:315a-39: gnyis las 'byung byed tshul dang ni //
T02D2169:315a-40: gcing la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2169:315a-41: cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya //
T02D2169:315a-42: rdzogs pa'i gnyis su bstan pa la //
T02D2169:315a-43: thabs kyi tshul gyis 'jug pa dang //
T02D2169:315a-44: shes rab tshul gyis 'jug pa po //
T02D2169:315a-45: thabs kyis 'jug pa'i tshul rnams ni //
T02D2169:315a-46: brgyad dkyil dgu yi bdag po la //
T02D2169:315a-47: man ngag stobs kyis 'jug pa dang //
T02D2169:315a-48: bcu drug bzhi yi bdag dkyil la //
T02D2169:315a-49: sbyor ba'i thabs kyis 'jug pa dang //
T02D2169:315a-50: de dang de las khyad par 'phags //
T02D2169:315a-51: shin tu bskor ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2169:315a-52: rim pa bzhin du 'jug pa dang //
T02D2169:315a-53: dang po 'byung byed gnas dag tu //
T02D2169:315a-54: tha ma cig shos 'byung ba la //
T02D2169:315b-0: @315b mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis //
T02D2169:315b-1: rim sogs man ngag shes par bya //
T02D2169:315b-2: shin tu 'jam pa'i stan nag la //
T02D2169:315b-3: rnal 'byor ci bder gnas nas ni //
T02D2169:315b-4: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2169:315b-5: sa bon spros pas lha rnam gsal //
T02D2169:315b-6: bla ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin pa //
T02D2169:315b-7: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la //
T02D2169:315b-8: dang po lus ngag gus pa yis //
T02D2169:315b-9: phyag 'tshal zhabs la reg par bya //
T02D2169:315b-10: phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod rnams //
T02D2169:315b-11: rim pas phul nas sdig pa bshags //
T02D2169:315b-12: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid shes par bya //
T02D2169:315b-13: sangs rgyas la sogs bde ba la //
T02D2169:315b-14: dga' ba bskyed de rjes yi rang ;
T02D2169:315b-15: / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D2169:315b-16: 'gro ba'i don du gsol ba gdab //
T02D2169:315b-17: dkyil 'khor lha la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2169:315b-18: lus kyang gus par dbul bar bya //
T02D2169:315b-19: sems bskyed lam la gnas par bya //
T02D2169:315b-20: phyag rgya mchog tu gzung bar bya //
T02D2169:315b-21: slar yang sngom pa brtan par gzung //
T02D2169:315b-22: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
T02D2169:315b-23: dag par byed pa'i sngags brjod pas //
T02D2169:315b-24: mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom //
T02D2169:315b-25: yod pa ma yin med pa min //
T02D2169:315b-26: snang ba ma yin 'gag med min //
T02D2169:315b-27: skye ba ma yin 'gag pa min //
T02D2169:315b-28: de la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis //
T02D2169:315b-29: mtshon te stong nyid gtan la dbab //
T02D2169:315b-30: stong nyid dngos po'i gnas tshul ni //
T02D2169:315b-31: gang du 'ang bsam du med mod kyang //
T02D2169:315b-32: ma rtogs log rtogs the tshom can //
T02D2169:315b-33: de rnams bsal ba'i don ched du //
T02D2169:315b-34: skye med 'gag med la sogs brjod //
T02D2169:315b-35: de las stong pa'i ngang las ni //
T02D2169:315b-37: / de steng sum las byung ba las //
T02D2169:315b-38: ri rab chen po bskyed par bya //
T02D2169:315b-39: de steng h'um las rdo rje ni //
T02D2169:315b-40: rgya gram ljang gu'i dkyil du ni //
T02D2169:315b-42: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bskyed //
T02D2169:315b-43: skad cig rdzus skyes tshul du ni //
T02D2169:315b-44: dbus kyi / gtso bos khro bcu bskyed ;
T02D2169:315b-45: / h'um bzhi gsang sngags brjod pa yis //
T02D2169:315b-46: bka' bsgo bas ni spru pa 'phros //
T02D2169:315b-47: gdug pa can ni ma lus bkug / rdo rje phur ba'i sngags brjod pas //
T02D2169:315b-48: shin tu k'hros pas sprul nas ni //
T02D2169:315b-49: brdeg pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni //
T02D2169:315b-50: brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdung bar bya'o//
T02D2169:316a-0: @316a * // me dpung tshogs kyis thal bar bsreg / nam mkha'i mthas klas tshun chad du //
T02D2169:316a-1: khro bo rnams kyi nang logs su //
T02D2169:316a-2: rdo rje gur dang ra ba gtams //
T02D2169:316a-3: rdo rje gur gyi nang logs su //
T02D2169:316a-4: gzhal yas khang ni mdzes par bskyed //
T02D2169:316a-6: lte bar nyi zla'i gdan ni brtsegs //
T02D2169:316a-7: gdan dang rgyan rnams kun ni rdzogs //
T02D2169:316a-8: mngon par byang chub cho ga yis //
T02D2169:316a-9: gtso bo'i sku ni bskyed par bya //
T02D2169:316a-10: dang po stong dang zla ba la //
T02D2169:316a-11: yig 'bru la sogs cho ga rdzogs //
T02D2169:316a-12: rdo rje la ni byin rlabs bsdu //
T02D2169:316a-13: sngags brjod bas ni sku bskyed do //
T02D2169:316a-14: gtso bo sku mdog mthing nag ni //
T02D2169:316a-15: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
T02D2169:316a-16: mche ba gtsigs pa 'dod dgur bsgyur //
T02D2169:316a-17: sku la sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2169:316a-19: phyag g-yas rdo rje khro bo bsdams //
T02D2169:316a-20: g-yon nas mkha' lding rgyal po spro //
T02D2169:316a-21: gtso bo de ltar bskyed nas ni ;
T02D2169:316a-23: rnam rgyal sku mdog dmar po ste //
T02D2169:316a-24: phyag g-yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2169:316a-25: g-yon pas dgra sta 'dzin pa ste //
T02D2169:316a-26: bar ma phyag gnyis gung mo dang //
T02D2169:316a-27: mthe bong ngos mdung gzhan rnams brkyang //
T02D2169:316a-28: de nyid snying gar bzung nas ni //
T02D2169:316a-29: de 'og zhags pa ral gri bsnams //
T02D2169:316a-30: lho yi padmar mgon po ni //
T02D2169:316a-31: sku mdog nag po zhal gcig pa //
T02D2169:316a-32: phyag kyang de bzhin gnyis pa ste //
T02D2169:316a-33: g-yas g-yon tsandan bing chen bsnams //
T02D2169:316a-34: nub kyi padmar lus ngan po //
T02D2169:316a-35: sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig pa //
T02D2169:316a-36: phyag gnyis mchod rten ne'u le bsnams //
T02D2169:316a-38: sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa //
T02D2169:316a-39: phyag gnyis brang bsnol sdigs mdzub 'phyar //
T02D2169:316a-40: shar lho'i 'dab mar gnod sbyin bskyed //
T02D2169:316a-41: sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig pa //
T02D2169:316a-42: phyag gnyis gri gug cang te'u bsnams //
T02D2169:316a-43: lho nub 'dab mar ro langs ma //
T02D2169:316a-44: sku mdog sngo skya zhal gcig pa //
T02D2169:316a-45: phyag na rdo rje lcags sgrog bzung //
T02D2169:316a-46: gung mo srin lag la sogs rnams //
T02D2169:316a-47: dam por bkug nas yongs su bsngams //
T02D2169:316a-48: mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang nas //
T02D2169:316a-49: spyi bor nges par bsnol ba rnams //
T02D2169:316a-50: nub byang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2169:316a-51: sku mdog dmar skya zhal gcig pa//
T02D2169:316b-0: @316b phyag gnyis sbyi bor sbyar nas su //
T02D2169:316b-1: me lce phreng ba yongs su 'dzin //
T02D2169:316b-2: byang shar mtshams kyi 'dab ma la //
T02D2169:316b-3: 'jigs byed kha dog sngo nag ma //
T02D2169:316b-4: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa //
T02D2169:316b-5: g-yas kyi dang pos glang po bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-6: g-yon gyis glang chen pags pa bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-7: de 'og dgra sta rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-8: tha ma mi mgo lcags kyu bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-9: gru chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi //
T02D2169:316b-10: 'od skyed ma ni sku mdog dkar //
T02D2169:316b-11: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-12: yid 'phrog ma ni sku mdog ser //
T02D2169:316b-13: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spos phor bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-14: kun bzang ma sku mdog dmar mo //
T02D2169:316b-15: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro mchog bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-16: glu sgra can sku mdog sngon po //
T02D2169:316b-17: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar //
T02D2169:316b-18: shar sgro khro mo srog gcod ma //
T02D2169:316b-19: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing //
T02D2169:316b-20: phyag gnyis thod ba zhags pa bsnams //
T02D2169:316b-21: lho sgor dbugs rdub sku mdog ser//
T02D2169:316b-22: zhal gcig phyag gnyis hom gzar zhags //
T02D2169:316b-23: nub sgor khrag 'thung sku mdog dmar //
T02D2169:316b-24: zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri gug zhags //
T02D2169:316b-25: byang sgor sha za sku mdog sngo //
T02D2169:316b-26: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnon po zhags //
T02D2169:316b-27: de rnams bskyed pa'i tshul rnams kyang //
T02D2169:316b-28: rnal 'byor spros dga'i sems byang phyir //
T02D2169:316b-30: so so'i thugs kyi mtshan ma'i rtags //
T02D2169:316b-31: dang po gsungs te gsum pa dgu //
T02D2169:316b-32: las kyi 'khor lo myur brtson pa /
T02D2169:316b-33: bskyed pa'am skad cig glog 'gyu'i tshul //
T02D2169:316b-34: cung zhig gsal bar bltas nas ni //
T02D2169:316b-35: sngags kyi cho ga shes pas su //
T02D2169:316b-36: ye shes dkyil 'khor bcas pa rnams //
T02D2169:316b-37: sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2169:316b-38: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas //
T02D2169:316b-39: mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2169:316b-40: mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya //
T02D2169:316b-41: gnod sbyin drag po'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D2169:316b-42: bgegs rnams ma lus bzlog par bya ;
T02D2169:316b-43: / rnam par rtog pa spang ba dang //
T02D2169:316b-44: lus ngag nus pa mthu bskyed phyir //
T02D2169:316b-45: lha rnams so sor bstim par bya //
T02D2169:316b-46: yi ge rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02D2169:316b-47: dag byed sku gsung cho gar ldan //
T02D2169:316b-48: dang por gsol 'debs cho ga yis //
T02D2169:316b-49: mchog rnams kun du bskul bas su //
T02D2169:317a-1: gshegs thams cad mnyes nas kyang //
T02D2169:317a-2: lha mo glu len gar byed mas //
T02D2169:317a-3: bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas kyang //
T02D2169:317a-4: rim bzhin dbang ni bskur bar byas //
T02D2169:317a-6: mchog rnams kun du bskul bas su //
T02D2169:317a-7: bde gshegs thams cad mnyes nas kyang //
T02D2169:317a-8: slob dpon mi bskyod yab yum la //
T02D2169:317a-9: gnyis dang gsum gyi man ngag blang //
T02D2169:317a-10: de nas lha la mchod ba dbul //
T02D2169:317a-11: phyi mchod nang mchod gsang ba'i mchod //
T02D2169:317a-12: mchod pa tshul bzhin dbul bar bya //
T02D2169:317a-13: phyi ni ji bzhin gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2169:317a-14: nang gi lha yi bde bskyed pa ;
T02D2169:317a-15: / cig shos lnga ru byas pa yin //
T02D2169:317a-16: rtag pa ldan pa de dag ni //
T02D2169:317a-17: gtso bo lnga yang byas pa yin //
T02D2169:317a-18: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis //
T02D2169:317a-19: gnyis pa la sogs sbyar ba dang //
T02D2169:317a-20: des ni dang po'i don kyang bya //
T02D2169:317a-21: rigs dang rtags ni ldan gyur pa'i //
T02D2169:317a-22: de nyid snying po de las byung //
T02D2169:317a-23: de dang dur khrod byung ba yin //
T02D2169:317a-24: snang ba med pa mchog yin no //
T02D2169:317a-25: lnga dang bcu ru sbyar ba yi //
T02D2169:317a-26: yid du 'ong ba dpag med mchog / de ni nang gi don bstan to //
T02D2169:317a-27: gu hya don ni bstan bya ba //
T02D2169:317a-28: grol dang phyag rgya gnyis su bstan //
T02D2169:317a-29: grol gyis yid kyi gzugs sprul to //
T02D2169:317a-30: phyag rgya rtags ldan dngos su 'dug / mi ldan byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D2169:317a-31: de rnams cho ga'i yan lag ni //
T02D2169:317a-32: rten dang brten pa'i tshul nyid kyis //
T02D2169:317a-33: dang por byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2169:317a-34: rten ni aa sa su byin gyis brlab //
T02D2169:317a-35: brten pa h'um gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2169:317a-36: rten dang brten pa'i gtso bo dang //
T02D2169:317a-37: yan lag rnams la lha rnams kyis ;
T02D2169:317a-38: / byin gyis brlab pa bstim par bya //
T02D2169:317a-39: dharma ae yi nang shes du //
T02D2169:317a-41: rin chen pho brang nang shed du //
T02D2169:317a-42: rtag pa nyid kyang bsam par bya //
T02D2169:317a-43: g-yas dag g-yon gyi thabs shes rab //
T02D2169:317a-44: lnga lnga yis ni gnas su bstan //
T02D2169:317a-45: bskyed cing dgyed par byed pa nyid //
T02D2169:317a-46: de yi grogs 'gyur gnyis dang bzhi //
T02D2169:317a-47: 'byed par byed dang skrod par byed //
T02D2169:317a-48: spro bar byed dang sdud par byed //
T02D2169:317a-49: de nyid spro bar byed pa yi //
T02D2169:317a-50: bde dang shin tu bde ba ni //
T02D2169:317a-51: khyad par mchog tu gyur pa ni //
T02D2169:317a-52: gsang don mchog tu spro ba'o //
T02D2169:317a-53: gnyis med spro ba'i 'od zer sogs //
T02D2169:317b-0: @317b de sogs cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2169:317b-1: rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis //
T02D2169:317b-2: rdo rje glu dang ldan pas bstod //
T02D2169:317b-3: h'um gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang mchog / sku
T02D2169:317b-4: gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog / mthun pa'i don
T02D2169:317b-8: / khams gsum rgyal bar byed pa'i mchog / dpal
T02D2169:317b-9: ldan nag po yon tan mchog / gsung gi sgra
T02D2169:317b-10: sgrogs rgyal po mchog / phrin las rang bzhin bdud
T02D2169:317b-11: rtsi 'khyil // 'byung bo 'jigs byed gnod sbyin mchog / dgra la rngams pa'i za byed ma //
T02D2169:317b-12: rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mchog /'jigs par byed pa'i sku 'chang ma //
T02D2169:317b-13: 'od kyis gsal byed mdzes pa'i mchog / yid du 'ong ba'i yon tan ma //
T02D2169:317b-14: lta spyod bzang bar byed pa'i mchog //
T02D2169:317b-15: sgra dang gar gyis mnyes mdzad ma //
T02D2169:317b-16: rnam par rtog pa gcod pa'i mchog /'byung po zhal du rdub byed ma //
T02D2169:317b-17: chags pa'i mdog can khrag 'thung ma ;
T02D2169:317b-18: / sa bdag dang ni dri za'i mchog / lha yi 'khor lo tshogs rnams la //
T02D2169:317b-19: bstod cing gus pas phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2169:317b-21: bstod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2169:317b-22: bstod cing mchod pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D2169:317b-23: nyid kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las //
T02D2169:317b-24: sprul nas nyid la mchod par bya //
T02D2169:317b-25: 'khor lo gzhan rnams kyang ni mchod //
T02D2169:317b-26: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni //
T02D2169:317b-27: dang po gtso bo bstan byas la //
T02D2169:317b-28: de nas 'khor lo rim gyis bstan //
T02D2169:317b-29: gtso bo rim gyis bstan pa dang //
T02D2169:317b-30: 'khor lo rim gyis bstan pa dang //
T02D2169:317b-31: rdzogs par lta ba gnyis su bya //
T02D2169:317b-32: dang por dbyug tshod phyed tsam la //
T02D2169:317b-33: de 'og dbyug tshod gcig tsam la //
T02D2169:317b-35: thun tshod rnams kyang rim gyis so //
T02D2169:317b-36: de ltar brtan par gyur nas ni //
T02D2169:317b-37: che bar 'dod na che bar ro //
T02D2169:317b-38: chung bar 'dod na chung ba nyid //
T02D2169:317b-39: mang por spros nas nyung bar bsdu //
T02D2169:317b-40: nyung bar sdud nas mang por spro //
T02D2169:317b-41: kha dog ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ;
T02D2169:317b-42: / ldang ba yang zhing gzi brjid ldan //
T02D2169:317b-43: yun ring btang yang mi 'chor la //
T02D2169:317b-44: rlang yang ji ltar 'dod par thub //
T02D2169:317b-45: bdud rtsi zas kyis 'tsho bar byed //
T02D2169:317b-46: des su bskyed pa mthar phyin te //
T02D2169:317b-47: bskyed pa mthar phyin dus su mi //
T02D2169:317b-48: mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzad spyod ston //
T02D2169:318a-2: mdzad spyod bstan pa'i las rnams bstan //
T02D2169:318a-3: de dus gsal zhing gsal gyur nas //
T02D2169:318a-4: yang nas yang du brtag par bya'o //
T02D2169:318a-5: man ngag zab mo don ston pa //
T02D2169:318a-6: gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D2169:318a-7: de ru bzlog pa'i don ston yang //
T02D2169:318a-8: mi 'jigs the tshom med pas su //
T02D2169:318a-9: man ngag bdud rtsi blang bar bya'o //
T02D2169:318a-10: gal te bskyed pas skyo gyur na //
T02D2169:318a-11: bsgom pa ma nus las gzhan phyir //
T02D2169:318a-12: bzlas brjod man ngag rgyas pa rnams //
T02D2169:318a-13: gzhan du bstan pa mang mod kyang //
T02D2169:318a-14: bzlas brjod mang ngag bdud rtsi 'di //
T02D2169:318a-15: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la //
T02D2169:318a-17: bstan par bya yis gus par nyon //
T02D2169:318a-18: snying ga'i 'khor lo'i man ngag la //
T02D2169:318a-19: sems dpa' gsum gyi man ngag rdzogs //
T02D2169:318a-21: yi ge 'phro ba'i man ngag dgod //
T02D2169:318a-22: 'khor zhing spros pas gyen du sbros ;
T02D2169:318a-23: / lce yid rdo rje rtse mo las //
T02D2169:318a-24: lha yi zhal du spro bar bya //
T02D2169:318a-25: mchod de gnas ni gang 'dod nas //
T02D2169:318a-26: slar la 'khod pas sgrib pa sbyang //
T02D2169:318a-27: sgra cher ma yin sgra chung min //
T02D2169:318a-28: yan lag ma nyams bzlas brjod bya //
T02D2169:318a-29: de ni phyi yi tshul du bstan //
T02D2169:318a-30: nang gi bzlas brjod bstan pa ni //
T02D2169:318a-31: aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang shed nas //
T02D2169:318a-32: kha dog lnga ldan rlung byung ste //
T02D2169:318a-33: de nyid rta yi tshul du bstan //
T02D2169:318a-34: phyir 'byung rta la aom ni zhon //
T02D2169:318a-35: nang du zhon pa h'um yin no //
T02D2169:318a-36: gnas par byed pa a'a:nyid yin //
T02D2169:318a-37: de ltar spro zhing bsdu pa la //
T02D2169:318a-38: dang por bcu la bstan par bya //
T02D2169:318a-39: de nas nyi shu la bstan no //
T02D2169:318a-40: de ltar gyur ba'i rim pa'i mthar //
T02D2169:318a-41: nang gi rim gyis bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2169:318a-42: snying ga'i thig le'i gnas dag la //
T02D2169:318a-43: 'dzin par nus so mchog yin no //
T02D2169:318a-44: de nyid gtan la dbab na ni //
T02D2169:318a-45: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya ni //
T02D2169:318a-46: nyin mtshan gcig la rgyu ba yin //
T02D2169:318a-47: de yang gnas kyi sde tshan bsdu ba ni //
T02D2169:318a-48: dang bor bcu drug gnyis par ni //
T02D2169:318a-49: sum cu ru ni shes par bya //
T02D2169:318a-50: bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad du bsdu //
T02D2169:318a-51: bzhi dang gnyis su bsdu ba'o //
T02D2169:318a-52: phyi phyung sgo yis 'byed tshul ni //
T02D2169:318a-53: g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyis ka yang //
T02D2169:318a-54: shin tu phra ba'i tshul du byed //
T02D2169:318a-55: me dang rlung dang sa dang ni //
T02D2169:318b-0: chu yi @318b rang bzhin dmar dang sngo //
T02D2169:318b-1: ser dang dkar ba nyid du 'dod //
T02D2169:318b-2: padma las dang rin chen dang //
T02D2169:318b-3: rdo rje thabs dang shes rab ni //
T02D2169:318b-4: de yi nus pa de ltar snang //
T02D2169:318b-5: dang po 'byung byed gnas dang ni //
T02D2169:318b-6: longs spyod chos dang sprul ba dang //
T02D2169:318b-8: de yang bsdu na gnyis su snang//
T02D2169:318b-9: gso bar byed pa srog 'dzin yin //
T02D2169:318b-10: phyi dang nang gis zhes kyang bya //
T02D2169:318b-11: 'chi byed cha rnams ma nyams par //
T02D2169:318b-12: rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin //
T02D2169:318b-13: de ltar spyod pa la sogs rnams //
T02D2169:318b-14: dngos po'i gnas lugs yin pas na //
T02D2169:318b-15: sngon du 'gro ba shin tu gces //
T02D2169:318b-16: bzlas pa'i don la mi 'jug gi //
T02D2169:318b-17: yang na sngon du song ba yis //
T02D2169:318b-18: rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug par bya //
T02D2169:318b-19: dngos po'i gnas lugs bstan pa ni //
T02D2169:318b-20: rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems //
T02D2169:318b-21: de yi spros bas ma bstan yang //
T02D2169:318b-22: bsdus pa'i don ni gsung du 'dus //
T02D2169:318b-23: thugs kyi 'khor lo gnas dag tu //
T02D2169:318b-24: rtsa yi 'dab ma brgyad yin te ;
T02D2169:318b-25: / de yi dbus su dh'u t'i gnas //
T02D2169:318b-26: de yi dkyil na 'od kyi ni //
T02D2169:318b-27: kha dog lnga ldan dkyil shes nas //
T02D2169:318b-28: thig le'i rang bzhin byang chub sems //
T02D2169:318b-29: bzhugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2169:318b-30: de nyid la ni mu stegs kyis //
T02D2169:318b-31: log pa rtogs pas bdud du 'gyur //
T02D2169:318b-32: rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog gis ni ;
T02D2169:318b-33: / de nyid nges par rtogs pas su //
T02D2169:318b-34: dngos grub rnam nyid de las 'byung //
T02D2169:318b-35: de bas rnal 'byor nan tan gyis //
T02D2169:318b-36: bla ma mnyes par byas nas kyang //
T02D2169:318b-37: bla ma'i zhal gyi sgo nas ni //
T02D2169:318b-38: de nyid man ngag shes par bya //
T02D2169:318b-39: kha dog lnga ldan de nyid la //
T02D2169:318b-40: dang po brtan par bltas nas ni //
T02D2169:318b-41: de nas rtags rnams byung ba dang //
T02D2169:318b-42: thig le nyid la brtan par bya //
T02D2169:318b-43: de la brtan nas spro ba dang //
T02D2169:318b-44: bsdu ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya //
T02D2169:318b-45: de nyid brtan par gyur ba na //
T02D2169:318b-46: bde dang shin tu bde ba dang //
T02D2169:318b-47: bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2169:318b-49: zhag bdun par du gnas pa 'byung ;
T02D2169:318b-50: / bdud rtsi 'dom gang lus khyab pas //
T02D2169:318b-51: bdud rtsi zas kyis gso bar byed //
T02D2169:318b-52: de 'og sgyu ma lta bu yis //
T02D2169:318b-53: dpe brgyad dag la bltas pas su //
T02D2169:318b-54: de nyid nges par thugs su chud //
T02D2169:318b-55: de 'og stong ba'i man ngag la //
T02D2169:318b-56: man ngag stobs kyis zhugs pas su //
T02D2169:319a-2: de nas 'gro ba gzhan don la //
T02D2169:319a-3: mos pa ma yin dngos su ni //
T02D2169:319a-4: 'jug pa'i stobs dang ldan par gyur //
T02D2169:319a-5: nyin mtshan phrugs re dag la yang //
T02D2169:319a-6: bde gshegs mang pos dkyil 'khor ston //
T02D2169:319a-7: de yi man ngag don rnams ni //
T02D2169:319a-8: ma lus shes par 'gyur ba yin ;
T02D2169:319a-9: / de ltar gzhan don mthar phyin pas //
T02D2169:319a-10: rang don lhun grub phyag rgya'i mchog / skad cig gcig la shes par bya //
T02D2169:319a-11: phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i mchog / khyad par phyag rgya mchog rnams ni //
T02D2169:319a-12: rim pa bzhin du 'grub pa ste //
T02D2169:319a-13: sras po'i tshul ni rdzogs nas kyang //
T02D2169:319a-14: yab kyi don ni rdzogs pa yin //
T02D2169:319a-15: de ltar rdzogs pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D2169:319a-16: rnal 'byor grol lam pa la bstan //
T02D2169:319a-17: phyag rgya'i lam la 'jug tshul ni //
T02D2169:319a-18: rtags dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ma /
T02D2169:319a-19: rtags dang ldan par btsal bar bya //
T02D2169:319a-20: de la brten nas ye shes ni //
T02D2169:319a-21: skye ba thabs kyi man ngag kyang //
T02D2169:319a-22: dang por byin rlabs la sogs bya //
T02D2169:319a-23: de nas man ngag thun tshod dang //
T02D2169:319a-24: gzung ba'i thabs ni shes par bya //
T02D2169:319a-25: de la brten par gyur nas ni //
T02D2169:319a-26: dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2169:319a-27: de la mngon par zhen chags na //
T02D2169:319a-29: de yi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:319a-30: nang gi phyag rgya nyid la bslab //
T02D2169:319a-31: de la brtan par gyur nas ni //
T02D2169:319a-32: de yi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:319a-33: gsang ba'i phyag rgya gtum mo'i mchog / de nyid la ni bslab pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:319a-34: 'khor lo la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02D2169:319a-36: thabs kyi rim pa bslab par bya //
T02D2169:319a-37: dmar po chen po spros shes la //
T02D2169:319a-38: rtags rnams rim pa lnga po 'byung //
T02D2169:319a-39: de 'og spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2169:319a-40: dgug dang mnan pa'i rim pa yang //
T02D2169:319a-41: dang po bslabs nas 'di la bstan //
T02D2169:319a-42: de la ldog par ma gyur na //
T02D2169:319a-43: 'di ru bzlog pa'i man ngag bstan //
T02D2169:319a-44: de 'og lhan cig skyes ma yi //
T02D2169:319a-45: man ngag stobs la zhugs pa yis //
T02D2169:319a-46: nam mkha'i bdud rtsi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2169:319a-48: de nas rten med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2169:319a-49: de nyid la ni 'jug par bya //
T02D2169:319a-50: yod dang med pa'i mtha' sogs kyi //
T02D2169:319b-0: rtog pa thams cad 'jig pa'i mchog / kun du bzang po'i don rtogs @319b 'gyur ;
T02D2169:319b-1: / de ltar rtog pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D2169:319b-2: shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang //
T02D2169:319b-3: bla ma la gus brtson 'grus ldan //
T02D2169:319b-4: g-yo sgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02D2169:319b-5: yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas kyi mchog /'brul bar byed pa bstan par bya //
T02D2169:319b-6: 'di ni rin chen gang zag yin //
T02D2169:319b-7: dang po man ngag thob bya'i phyir ;
T02D2169:319b-8: / g-yo sgyu'i bsam pa ldan pas su //
T02D2169:319b-9: shin tu gus pas tshul du byed //
T02D2169:319b-10: man ngag thob par gyur nas ni //
T02D2169:319b-11: bla ma la ni rgyab kyis phyogs //
T02D2169:319b-12: dmyal ba yi ni rgyu sogs pa //
T02D2169:319b-13: de ni rgyun du spong ba yin //
T02D2169:319b-14: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas ni //
T02D2169:319b-16: / srung ba'i 'khor lor bstan pa yin //
T02D2169:319b-17: dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la //
T02D2169:319b-18: 'khor lo'i rim pa brtsam pa yin //
T02D2169:319b-19: de med gyur na gro ga'am //
T02D2169:319b-20: shing shun dag las bya ba yin //
T02D2169:319b-21: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni //
T02D2169:319b-22: dbus su snying po'i don bstan la //
T02D2169:319b-23: phyogs su bzhi po don ni bstan //
T02D2169:319b-24: mtshams ni 'grub par byed pa yin //
T02D2169:319b-25: 'khor lo rtsibs kyi mtshams su ni //
T02D2169:319b-26: gang yin pa yi ming rnams ni //
T02D2169:319b-27: phyi rol du mu khyud bzang po la //
T02D2169:319b-28: thabs dang shes rab yi ge dgod //
T02D2169:319b-29: de ltar 'khor lo brtsams nas ni //
T02D2169:319b-30: mandal mchod pa la sogs bshams //
T02D2169:319b-31: bdag nyid rnal 'byor rdzogs byas la //
T02D2169:319b-32: de yang lha yis 'khor lo bskyed //
T02D2169:319b-33: ye shes lha la mchod byas la //
T02D2169:319b-34: gsol ba btab ste gnyis bsre //
T02D2169:319b-35: de nas bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas bya //
T02D2169:319b-36: so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags 'di la //
T02D2169:319b-37: bar du ming rnams bcug nas ni //
T02D2169:319b-38: de nas bsrung ba'i sngags gdags bya //
T02D2169:319b-39: sngags rnams kyang ni bstan bya ste //
T02D2169:319b-40: aom na mo n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra
T02D2169:319b-41: p'a ni ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye
T02D2169:319b-42: h'um h'um phat / aom tree lo kya bi dza ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-43: aom ma h'a k'a la ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-44: aom bee shra ba na ye h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-45: aom aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-47: aom badzra bee ta li h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-48: aom badzra d'a k'i ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-49: aom badzra bhee ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-50: aom bi dang ta ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-51: aom ma mo ha ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-52: aom sa manta bha dri ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-53: aom shapta g'i ti ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-54: aom pra ti sa ta mi ya h'um phat /
T02D2169:319b-55: aom sho sa ga pa ye h'um phat /
T02D2169:320a-2: aom ma sa bhakshi ni h'um phat /
T02D2169:320a-3: aom n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2169:320a-4: ces pa ni drag po'i sngags bsdus pa'o //
T02D2169:320a-5: sv'a h'a zhes pa ni zhi ba'i 'o //
T02D2169:320a-6: aom zhes pa ni rgyas pa'i 'o //
T02D2169:320a-7: ho zhes pa ni dbang gi'o //
T02D2169:320a-8: raksha raksha zhes pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o //
T02D2169:320a-9: bsrung ba'i sngags ni 'di dag la //
T02D2169:320a-10: bar du ming ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2169:320a-11: srung ba'i 'khor lo de dag kyang //
T02D2169:320a-12: bzhi tshan bzhi yis bsrung ba dang //
T02D2169:320a-13: gtso bo nyid dang bcas te bsrung //
T02D2169:320a-14: yang na sde tshen so sor bsrung //
T02D2169:320a-15: gtso bo gcig pus bsrung ba yin //
T02D2169:320a-16: yang na so sor re res kyang //
T02D2169:320a-17: bsrung ba'i cho ga shes par bya //
T02D2169:320a-18: thams cad kun gyis bsrung ba yi //
T02D2169:320a-19: 'khor lo bcas ba'i thabs bstan pa //
T02D2169:320a-20: dang po 'khor lo brgyad pa la //
T02D2169:320a-21: rim pa gnyis pa bcu gnyis dang //
T02D2169:320a-22: de 'og rim pa bcu drug pa'o //
T02D2169:320a-23: mtha' ma mu khyud gnyis dang ldan //
T02D2169:320a-24: dang po gtso bo'i rim pas dgod //
T02D2169:320a-25: de 'og sde tshan gnyis pa dgod //
T02D2169:320a-26: tha ma sde tshan gnyis su bstan //
T02D2169:320a-27: mu khyud zlum po gnyis la ni //
T02D2169:320a-28: shes rab thabs kyi yi ge 'god //
T02D2169:320a-30: rnam pa gsum du shes par bya //
T02D2169:320a-31: zhi bar bya dang dbang du bsdu //
T02D2169:320a-32: rgyas dang drag sogs gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2169:320a-33: man ngag gis ni sbyor zhes bya'o //
T02D2169:320a-34: las bzhi yi ni 'khor lo la //
T02D2169:320a-35: bzlas pa khri tsho gcig gis 'grub //
T02D2169:320a-36: de yang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2169:320a-37: bsrung ba la sogs gzhan dag la //
T02D2169:320a-38: de ltar bzlas nas mchog tu bstan //
T02D2169:320a-39: nyi shu rtsa gcig tsam bzlas kyang //
T02D2169:320a-40: sngags kyi nus pa mthu rnams kyis //
T02D2169:320a-41: bsrung dang bskyab pa 'grub par gsungs //
T02D2169:320a-43: brten na cho ga gzhan dag ni //
T02D2169:320a-44: thams cad kun la 'grub par gsungs //
T02D2169:320a-45: de ltar 'khor lo'i man ngag sogs //
T02D2169:320a-46: gab pa'i don dang sbas pa'i don //
T02D2169:320a-47: dgongs pa'i don dang dgra bzlog don //
T02D2169:320a-48: rnam brgyud 'ongs pa la brten nas //
T02D2169:320a-49: man ngag can gyis shes par bya'o //
T02D2169:320a-50: rnal 'byor bsdus pa'i don ched du //
T02D2169:320a-51: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur ram //
T02D2169:320a-53: bcu bdun lha yi dkyil 'khor las //
T02D2169:320a-54: bcu gsum dag tu bsdu ba dang //
T02D2169:320a-55: de la dgu ru bsdu ba dang //
T02D2169:320b-0: lnga ru yang ni @320b bsdu bar bya //
T02D2169:320b-1: gnyis su bsdu ba bcu drug tshogs //
T02D2169:320b-2: yang na rgyan cig rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2169:320b-3: bcu bdun du yang shes par bya //
T02D2169:320b-4: de ltar bsten pa sngon song bas //
T02D2169:320b-5: phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'o //
T02D2169:320b-6: las dang sgrub pa thams cad la //
T02D2169:320b-7: nges par 'jug par shes par bya'o //
T02D2169:320b-8: sbyor ba'i che rkyen gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2169:320b-9: dus skabs sbyar te shes par bya //
T02D2169:320b-10: de ltar the tshom med gyur na //
T02D2169:320b-11: mkha' 'gro ma yi rtags ston pas //
T02D2169:320b-12: de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni //
T02D2169:320b-13: bsgrims te shes par ma byas na //
T02D2169:320b-15: de bas mkhas pas nan tan du//
T02D2169:320b-16: sngags kyi lta ba spyod pa ni //
T02D2169:320b-17: bla ma mkhas la mnyan par gyis //
T02D2169:320b-18: mi mkhas tshul 'chos g-yon can gyis //
T02D2169:320b-19: gnyi ga brlag ste dmyal bar lhung //
T02D2169:320b-20: mkhas pa rna brgyud thos pa ni //
T02D2169:320b-21: 'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang //
T02D2169:320b-22: bdag dang gzhan ni gnyig yang //
T02D2169:320b-24: / de bas bla ma mkhas pa ni //
T02D2169:320b-25: dang po nyid du btsal bar bya //
T02D2169:320b-26: man ngag can ni rnyed nas kyang //
T02D2169:320b-28: ngal ba don med 'bras bu med //
T02D2169:320b-29: las ngan dus kyi tha ma la //
T02D2169:320b-30: gang zag 'dod pa'i dbang gis ni //
T02D2169:320b-31: lta spyod sna tshogs ston pa 'byung ;
T02D2169:320b-32: / gsang sngags dngos grub ma thob par //
T02D2169:320b-33: sgra dang mtshan ma la brten nas //
T02D2169:320b-34: nga rgyal 'dod pa'i dbang gyur nas //
T02D2169:320b-36: de nas yang dag don mi rnyed //
T02D2169:320b-37: la la mu stegs dag dang bsre //
T02D2169:320b-38: des ni dmyal ba'i gnas su khrid //
T02D2169:320b-40: de lta'i spyod pa ma byung yang //
T02D2169:320b-41: mthu rnams je chung rje chung 'byung //
T02D2169:320b-42: nad dang mu ge la sogs pa //
T02D2169:320b-44: las ngan dus kyi tha ma la //
T02D2169:320b-45: slob dpon sku la bod ba dang //
T02D2169:320b-47: / de la bzod pa mi bsgom ste //
T02D2169:320b-49: de las gzhan du byas gyur na //
T02D2169:320b-50: dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar 'gro //
T02D2169:320b-51: dpal ldan rdo rje rje mthu stobs can //
T02D2169:320b-52: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis //
T02D2169:321a-2: dbang bskur mnga' gsol mdzad nas ni //
T02D2169:321a-3: gsang sngags 'khor lo mtha' dag ni //
T02D2169:321a-4: khyod kyis bsdus la khyod kyis bskor //
T02D2169:321a-5: bde gshegs rnams kyi bka' yang bsgo //
T02D2169:321a-6: 'khor lo rgyas par bskor nas kyang //
T02D2169:321a-8: / rtsod pa rgyas pa'i dus dag tu //
T02D2169:321a-9: bskor na las rnams 'grub pa dang //
T02D2169:321a-10: de las gus pa mang 'gyur pas //
T02D2169:321a-11: de yi dus su bstan par bya //
T02D2169:321a-12: rgyal ba nyid kyis de skad gsung //
T02D2169:321a-13: de bzhin bdag ni rjes mthun pas //
T02D2169:321a-15: phyogs rnams kun gyis gsol gdab dang //
T02D2169:321a-16: bdag rang bsod nams bsags pa'i phyir //
T02D2169:321a-17: 'di bstan pa yi sems pa skyes //
T02D2169:321a-18: brtson 'grus dag pa'i sgo nas ni //
T02D2169:321a-19: lha rnams sgrub cing gsol gdab pas //
T02D2169:321a-20: gsang sngags don dang mthun pa yis //
T02D2169:321a-21: sems pa skye ba de nyid srung //
T02D2169:321a-22: dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni //
T02D2169:321a-23: bye ba brgya phrag mang po las //
T02D2169:321a-24: gzi brjid khang pa'i nang du shar //
T02D2169:321a-25: de bzhin 'od zer phra mo gcig / bdag blo yi ni mun par snang //
T02D2169:321a-26: snang ba de yang bdag gis ni //
T02D2169:321a-27: gzhan rnams kun la bstan par bya //
T02D2169:321a-28: man ngag 'di bkod cho ga yis //
T02D2169:321a-29: bdag dang sems can thams cad kun //
T02D2169:321a-30: bsod nams 'di la brten nas ni //
